title: Quess Corp's headcount crosses 600,000, joins global league of staffing giants
description: The Bengaluru-headquartered firm, which offers staffing, workforce management and technology outsourcing services, ended the June quarter with an employee count of 597,000. Since then, it has added at least 6,000 workers, chairman Ajit Isaac told ET.
content: Business services provider Quess Corp's global headcount has topped 600,000, putting it in the same league with global staffing behemoths Adecco, Randstad and Manpower, and software services giant Tata Consultancy Services in terms of number of employees.
cleaned_content: business services provider quess corps global headcount has topped <SIX_HUNDRED_THOUSAND> putting it in the same league with global staffing behemoths adecco randstad and manpower and software services giant tata consultancy services in terms of number of employees
